decision_conditions: It is recommended that the trees that sit on the flank and on the left hand side of the garden of  61 Balgores Lane, this property is with in the Gidea Park Conservation Area, the row of conifers can be reduced by up to 3m and no more than 40%, of their existing height, and faced up off the highway to create a formal hedge.
The two small cherries can be overall crown reduced by up to 30%
You should comply with British Standard No. 3998 'Recommendations for Tree Work' a copy of which can be inspected at this office.

Please note that if the work for which consent is granted is not carried out within 2 years of the date of this letter, it will be necessary to submit a fresh application if it is intended to implement the work.
description:
To reduce height of conifer height by 8-10 feet (2.5-3meters) and then trimmed and shaped up, as the trees hang over the roadside now. 
To reduce 2x small cherry trees by 20-30% of its crown, to promote good heath of the cherry trees
